text: Johnny "Guitar" Watson (February 3, 1935 â€“ May 17, 1996) was an American singer. He sang blues, soul and funk music. He had hit songs in the 1970s with "Ain't That a Bitch" and "Superman Lover". He had many other hits. Watson was born in Houston, Texas. He died from a heart attack in Japan. ==References== Category:American R&B; musicians Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Musicians from Houston Category:1935 births Category:1996 deaths
title: Johnny "Guitar" Watson
